# Using PAST

The following block of code calls the `merge()` function of PAST with example data and loads the LD data. This documentation will be extended as the software is developed.

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(past)
all_data<-merge_data("../example/GrainColorGLMStatsHiMAF.txt", "../example/GrainColorGLMAllEffHiMAF.txt")
LD<-parse_LD("../example/KernelColorLD.txt.gz") # parse_LD can take gzip-compressed files or plain text
```
